fxInfo_label: Subnational election area less free and fair name
fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: If providing names of all the relevant territorial units is not possible, use broad categories (for example, "the North").
fxInfo_question: In which areas of the country are subnational elections significantly less free and fair than the country average for subnational elections?
